examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Need assistance with payment. Please call <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: My credit card payment didn't go through but it should now but I don't know if you are going to try again & I don't want to lose my designs! You don't have a phone number to contact anyone or a live chat option?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Payment I need help and a phone call would be great

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I keep having issues with payment. Can someone please assist?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Would like to purchase a pro account but have a question about payment. Please contact me. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to get the deal that's going on right now and not sure if I bought it or not. Please contact (916) <NUMBER>to process payment or confirm right away. Your help is much appreciated.

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: Hello, I require someone from your team to contact me, as I want to see the payment methods you have for Canva Pro (account for or hotel). Thank you
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: The payment method with which I have already paid before will not accept me, they told me to contact you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I wanted to speak with someone in regards to billing. I wanted to get an account for our small team but wanted to see if I could make a full payment instead of a monthly recurring charge. 

Thank you, 

<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Cannot get payment verified or get a timely response from Canva on the issue.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Доброго дня! payment failed. Re-transaction, my limit on online payments now allows you to pay for the service. Thanks. If necessary, you can call <NUMBER><NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please contact me at <EMAIL> regarding payment

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: please contact <EMAIL> regarding payment options and restrictions

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hello I activated my account early today through my Apple ID subscription, I have proof of the payment on my bank statement and the app is active on my list of subscriptions. I keep receiving a message on my account that I need to enter my card again or I will lose my premium service. Do you need proof of the payment?

What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Hello, where can I talk about payments? I saw that I am pending, but it did not fall on my card bill. I would like to remedy the pending issue. Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have updated my payment details please can you put the payment through again.  Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please send me an e-mail contact where I can ask question regarding the different payment plans, I am considering getting an annual plan under  a business brand, would like to know details. Thank you for your help. Please e-mail me back at <EMAIL>
Thank you.
-Silvana Hargrave

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: In my team administration didn't fill any billing details like no company name and no billing address so if it affects our payment to you??

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am having trouble with my sales page and payment page-no data is displaying.Also I have contacted you about my January payment which I haven't received yet.Can you check what is the problem?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I would like to catch up with my Canva payment for the month how do I do this?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Unauthorized payment in my account?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, How do I give limited access to my Pro account to my Virtual Assistant? I don't want her to access payments or passwords etc..

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am being billed 2x each month on different payment methods for the same service. Can someone please contact me ASAP?

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: I would like to speak to an Advisor following the payment you made on Monday without my agreement for the payment of 107.85 €. I wish to cancel this payment because my situation does not allow me to do so as of today being without work. I find it would be more professional to allow us to speak to a Counselor to resolve a situation. It is not respectful to impose without asking our agreement out of respect. I just need time to bounce back to engage. Sincerely, Veronique Peudennier

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: We got a confirmation call to approve payment on the entered card. However the call got disconnected due to some coverage issues. The system has interpreted it as a payment failure. Therefore request you to please retry the payment as the method/card details entered are correct and the card is operational.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Billing

I note that I have been charged for a subscription, I did not authorise these payments. 

Please contact me to discuss:

<EMAIL>
+<NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am having an issue with the card payments

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello. My first payment went out on 13th January but I’m not able to access my Pro account. Can you please just confirm whether it is active. Many thanks. Steve Dengate
Quel problème rencontrez-vous ?: hello sorry can i have a prof of payment ? thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

Happy New Year!  Hope this email finds you well!

Just to let you know that I've updated my payment details so would you try again please?

Thank you in advance!

Best,
Hemmat

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I still have unauthorised payments coming out of my account.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I am trying to make payment so that my account does not expire. I have tried paypal and two cards and none have been able to go through.  Can you please call me to collect info over phone so that my account does not lapse?  Or, can you look at my most recent card addition and let me know why that payment is showing up as "fail?"  Thank you, Tiffany Bell <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I signed up for an account for a new job. My payment information was saved on the company devices. I was not aware of any memberships until I recently saw some charges. I have not been with thag company since sept. I am mow assuming they did not remove my information from their devices and may be using my payments? Can you refund me for the charges or what is the process? Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I just upgrade to Canva Pro, however, I need to request for a immediate payment instead of waiting till the trail period is over.

Can you provide a email address that I can communicate my special needs in payment and ask about the procedures in doing so?
Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need someone to contact me immediately. I have never experienced this type of customer service where I can’t reach someone. I had a monthly subscription with the Pro plan. On January 12th, I decided to upgrade from monthly and paid for a year subscription via iTunes. iTunes shows my subscription is valid until January
12, 2022 with a charge for $119.99.  I My account was downgraded to BASIC and my payment was in a pending status for three days! I sent several emails! I eventually contacted my bank and issued a stop payment to pay with a credit card vice a debit card. Unfortunately, that payment has also been pending since the 12th. What is going on? I completely lost and unable to use this program for my business.  I need customer service or I may have to file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. My cell is 561.818.9886 or <EMAIL>

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, I replied to your email, sending the payment made by Google .. but come back .. tell me where to send the files? Also I noticed that the account used for the payment is wrong .. what can I do? I await response. Thanks Franca Rocca

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i have reveices ANOTHER drbit from my Credit card, i dont have a subscription, i have checked my google account and NO subscriptions,  i have also tried to log in with other email addresses and this is the only one i have used,  this is my 2nd complaint, 
i have had 2 unauthorized payments come out now i need this resolved.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have done payment from my iPhone account and it’s still not activated

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was again charged. I didnt want to press the option for purchase the "Pro" option but it was automatically connected. Very tricky from the platform. Please, adjust again my credit-card payment. I didnt authorize it.

Describe the issue: I don't use app. I don't need a reason!! 
Charged $119.40
Payment #<NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Payment I don't recognise. I received an email notifying me of a $17.99. I dont  know what it is for as I get a forbidden message when I hit the link. I cant add screenshots as that feature isnt working either....

What is your problem related to ?: Other Describe the problem .: Good afternoon, can you please tell me if you received your payment? I entered the details of the new card on the site, but still have not received confirmation of payment from you. Best regards, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I don’t remember signing up yet here I am getting emails and payments sent please cancel all transactions  owed payments and cancel the account please 
thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I tried previously to have my account payments switched from my Amex corporate card to my personal one; however, my Amex was still charged. Can my December payment be refunded and then charged to my personal card instead? Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there, my payment didn't go through due to insufficient funds. The funds are sufficient now, will I be charged again automaticly? When? Or what do I have to do to complete payment before my trail period ends?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Can I add my coupon to my monthly payments? Like credit my account?

What do you need help with?: I need someone to contact me immediately. I have never experienced this type of customer service where I cant reach someone. I had a monthly subscription with the Pro plan. On January 12th, I decided to upgrade from monthly and paid for a year subscription.  My account was downgraded to BASIC and my payment was in a pending status for three days! I sent several emails! I eventually contacted my bank and issued a stop payment to pay with a credit card vice a debit card. Unfortunately, that payment has also been pending since the 12th. What is going on? I completely lost and unable to use this program for my business.  I need customer service or I may have to file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. My cell is 561.818.9886 or <EMAIL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Today is the last day of my trial. Still, I haven't seen the payment in my credit card details. Is there a problem? I do not want to lose the works of last 30 days.
Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have had 2 payments taken from my account but i dont have a business account. Please can you look into this, reimburse money and cancel. Thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I signed up for the free trail today but I found another option! How do I cancel my trail and future payments?
